thread.title: Residents are forced to live surrounded by FROZEN SEWAGE | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Residents are forced to live surrounded by FROZEN SEWAGE | Daily Mail Online

author: Hannah Al-Othman For Mailonline
title: Residents are forced to live surrounded by FROZEN SEWAGE | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Residents of the block say the tower of smelly brown ice gets bigger and bigger by the day and they have now taken their case to the public prosecutor and local health watchdogs. They have also been posting pictures of the problem on social media, which clearly show that the building is in a poor state of repair and filled with frozen excrement. The problem reportedly started in one of the flats where sewage started leaking from a broken pipe, but residents say it escalated after housing chiefs failed to act. Those living in the building have also been posting pictures of the problem on social media The problem started in one of the flats where sewage started leaking from a broken pipe Residents of the block say the tower of smelly brown ice gets bigger and bigger by the day They want the problem to be fixed before warmer weather comes, and melts the frozen waste Resident Lyubov Keller said: 'This is disgusting - it's just frozen urine and faeces. 'There is also a lot of mould in the hall. We try not to let our children out too much, as we are afraid the ceiling might collapse.' Ms Keller added that during the day the frozen sewage would start to melt making the smell intolerable, severely affecting her asthma. Despite complaining to the local housing department, health watchdogs and prosecutors, the residents are still waiting for any action to be taken.
